title: erikalui
author: erikalui
content: I have 23 coins of 50 paise ranging from the period 1984-2002, 10 coins of 25 paise ranging from the period 1975-2002 and 1 coin of 5 paise of the year 1967.All are Indian coins only.If anyone is interested in buying these coins, kindly pm me or post here.

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Are these rare coins or just regular but out-of-order coins? Any precious metal components?If you show some pics and some background you may have a better chance of creating some interest.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: If you want to sell anything in this section of the forum...please read this excellent thread made by Satslife. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5277761.0  HOW TO BUY OR SELL HERE...covers all you need to do the right way.   Goodluck with your sales
